segments.text: I notice the angled view of the kitchen, showing the sink and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, towel in hand, drying the plate carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware of the faucet running wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle will cause slips if not cleaned up soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing the stool to get to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is extended, plate in one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, arm up for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're collaborating in secret, which is kind of sweet but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a serene garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It contrasts with the potential trouble inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool holds and no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene tugs at my heart, seeing the unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR
